flawed_nl_solution:
If tickets are valued at $3 then in total, Taegan has won $30 in total tickets / $3 per ticket = <<30/3=10>>10 tickets.
Some of these tickets were found so only 10 total tickets - 5 found tickets = <<10-5=10>>10 tickets were won from carnival games.
She therefore won 10 tickets / 5 carnival games = <<10/5=2>>2 ticket from each game.
#### 2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
